name: Custom Eyes - Tortoise - Brown
description: Our "Custom Eyes" hinge technology enables interchangeability amongst ALL of our "Custom Eyes" frames & colors! Created with 100% mirrored UV 400 lens protection, the unique polycarbonate frame design has become an iconic fixture of pop culture fashion. Durably crafted and exceptional in quality and price. It's no secret why Melting Hearts are worn by movie stars, rock stars, athletes and trendsetters around the world. • Handcrafted Frames from Polycarbonate. • Crystal clear Mirrored lenses. • Interchangeable Arms • Custom metal temple details. • 100% UV 400 lens protection. • Frame measures: 52-42-12-145 Included with purchase: • Microfiber Melting Hearts Pouch. Shipping: Shipping is processed via "express courier" with delivery next day to major centers and 2 day to rural points within Canada. All packages shipped to the United States are delivered via ground delivery. International shipping rates apply.

name: Wildhearts - Tortuga
description:
• Tortoise Gloss Finish
• Brown Gradient Lenses
• Gold WILD Temple Logos
• Handcrafted Acetate Frames
• Interior Arm Structure Support
• 5 Barrel French Comotec Hinges

• Comes With Padded Sleeve & Microfiber Cloth

name: Originals - Yellow
description:
Custom frames with 100% mirrored UV 400 lens protection. The unique polycarbonate frame design has become an iconic fixture of pop culture fashion. Durably crafted and exceptional in quality and price. It's no secret why Melting Hearts are worn by movie stars, rock stars, athletes and trendsetters around the world.

• Handcrafted Frames from Polycarbonate.
• Crystal clear Mirrored lenses.
• Durable metal hinges.
• Custom metal temple details.
• 100% UV 400 lens protection.
• Frame measures: 52-42-12-145

Included with purchase:

• Melting Hearts Neoprene Strap.
• Microfiber Melting Hearts Pouch.
• Melting Hearts Sticker.

Shipping:

Shipping is processed via "express courier" with delivery next day to major centers and 2 day to rural points within Canada. All packages shipped to the United States are delivered via ground delivery. International shipping rates apply.
